name: INPaymentStatusResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for the payment status of a bill during a search.

items.name: class func success(with: INPaymentStatus) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified value.

items.name: class func confirmationRequired(with: INPaymentStatus) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user confirm the value before proceeding.
